feed.title: The blog of Instantbird's development - Comments: Instantbird 0.2 beta 2 released in 4 languages!

entry.title: Posted by: Nigcra
entry.content: Instantbird is so great and fast! I love it! Just a little more features (avatar selection + view in contact list, multicontacts, german translation) and I would kick Pidgin away.

entry.title: Posted by: NeMMo
entry.summary:
Yeah it’s a real great freeware, but there somes bugs :
- When you create a group that is put in contact. We restart the program and then we find our contact twice. Once in the group overall, a time in the lower one in which we move.
- Some contact don …
entry.content:
Yeah it’s a real great freeware, but there somes bugs :
- When you create a group that is put in contact. We restart the program and then we find our contact twice. Once in the group overall, a time in the lower one in which we move.
- Some contact don’t become ‘in line’

entry.title: Posted by: Florian
entry.content: @./cewood Thanks for the encouraging message! Instantbird is not a project of the Mozilla Foundation. Any additional resource might help. Additional visibility would definitely help.

entry.title: Posted by: ./cewood
entry.summary:
Keep up the great work guys!

There is definitely a lot of potential for this project, a Firefox equivalent for IM could be catastrophic, I am very excited to see where this project goes in the future.

Just a quick question, is this project officially part of Mozilla, and if …
entry.content:
Keep up the great work guys!

There is definitely a lot of potential for this project, a Firefox equivalent for IM could be catastrophic, I am very excited to see where this project goes in the future.

Just a quick question, is this project officially part of Mozilla, and if not is that something which might help moving forward?

entry.title: Posted by: Florian
entry.content: @(anonymous)1: Uncheck “Require SSL/TLS” in the Advanced Options of the account.

entry.title: Posted by: (anonymous)
entry.content: Definitely shaping up to be the best instant messenger…the potential is becoming a reality…Keep up the great work.
